vulnerabilities.title: Outray cli is vulnerable to race conditions in tunnels creation
vulnerabilities.description:
### Summary

A TOCTOU race condition vulnerability allows a user to exceed the set number of active tunnels in their subscription plan.

### Details

Affected conponent: `apps/web/src/routes/api/tunnel/register.ts`
- `/tunnel/register` endpoint code-:

```ts
// Check if tunnel already exists in database
          const [existingTunnel] = await db
            .select()
            .from(tunnels)
            .where(eq(tunnels.url, tunnelUrl));

          const isReconnection = !!existingTunnel;

vulnerabilities.title: Outray has a Race Condition in the cli's webapp
vulnerabilities.description:
### Summary
This vulnerability allows a user i.e a free plan user to get more than the desired subdomains due to lack of db transaction lock mechanisms in `https://github.com/akinloluwami/outray/blob/main/apps/web/src/routes/api/%24orgSlug/subdomains/index.ts`

### Details
- The affected code-:

```ts
//Race condition
        const [subscription] = await db
          .select()
          .from(subscriptions)
          .where(eq(subscriptions.organizationId, organization.id));

        const curre
